translation: Long ago, in an age tarnished by endless conflict,{#Name="Old Man"}
source: Long ago, in an age tarnished by endless conflict,{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: five beautiful goddesses descended upon the land.{#Name="Old Man"}
source: five beautiful goddesses descended upon the land.{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: The goddesses sang mystical songs that restored{LF}peace and harmony to our broken world.{#Name="Old Man"}
source: The goddesses sang mystical songs that restored{LF}peace and harmony to our broken world.{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: The people began to worship these holy songstresses,{#Name="Old Man"}
source: The people began to worship these holy songstresses,{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: and came to refer to them as "Intoners."{#Name="Old Man"}
source: and came to refer to them as "Intoners."{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: Thanks to the efforts of these Intoners,{LF}the chaos of war became a distant memory.{#Name="Old Man"}
source: Thanks to the efforts of these Intoners,{LF}the chaos of war became a distant memory.{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: And as a result, mankind enjoyed an age of sweet reverie,{#Name="Old Man"}
source: And as a result, mankind enjoyed an age of sweet reverie,{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: basking in the newfound light and beau—{#Name="Old Man"}
source: basking in the newfound light and beau—{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: Y-You...murderous savage...{#Name="Old Man"}
source: Y-You...murderous savage...{#Name="Old Man"}

translation: Savage? I think you mean Intoner.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Savage? I think you mean Intoner.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: She's in there! Take her down!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: She's in there! Take her down!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Kill the traitorous demon!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Kill the traitorous demon!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Michael...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Michael...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's time...to put an end to the Intoners.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's time...to put an end to the Intoners.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ★ゼロと敵のやりとり。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ★ゼロと敵のやりとり。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ★ゼロとミカエルのやりとり。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ★ゼロとミカエルのやりとり。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ★ゼロがウタヒメである事、裏切り者である事の説明。{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ★ゼロがウタヒメである事、裏切り者である事の説明。{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Zero! Go! Defeat your sisters!{#Name="Michael"}
source: Zero! Go! Defeat your sisters!{#Name="Michael"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No! You don't have the strength for this!{#Name="Zero"}
source: No! You don't have the strength for this!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: These puppets are no match for a dragon!{#Name="Michael"}
source: These puppets are no match for a dragon!{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Fine. Just don't die on me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Fine. Just don't die on me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Farewell, fool...{#Name="Michael"}
source: Farewell, fool...{#Name="Michael"}

translation: All of you...{#Name="Zero"}
source: All of you...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Women, children, the elderly... It doesn't matter.{LF}If you stand in my way, you're gonna die.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Women, children, the elderly... It doesn't matter.{LF}If you stand in my way, you're gonna die.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If that's what you want...then get in line!{#Name="Zero"}
source: If that's what you want...then get in line!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's her! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: It's her! It's Zero!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: She looks so sinister... Is she really an Intoner?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: She looks so sinister... Is she really an Intoner?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Hyaaaa! Look sharp, men! Keep our Intoners safe!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Hyaaaa! Look sharp, men! Keep our Intoners safe!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Fight smart! Dying here accomplishes nothing!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Fight smart! Dying here accomplishes nothing!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: The dragon's too strong!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: The dragon's too strong!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Somebody help me!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Somebody help me!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: A war between Intoners... Truly the world has gone mad.{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: A war between Intoners... Truly the world has gone mad.{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It's over... We're all going to die...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It's over... We're all going to die...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Keep it up! Don't lose hope!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Keep it up! Don't lose hope!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: No retreat! Zero must be stopped!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: No retreat! Zero must be stopped!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: The demon's trying to kill her sisters!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: The demon's trying to kill her sisters!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Kill the traitor! We must protect our homeland!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Kill the traitor! We must protect our homeland!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: If this keeps up, our world as we know it is over...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: If this keeps up, our world as we know it is over...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: We're not about to let that happen!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: We're not about to let that happen!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Shit, my bow broke!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Shit, my bow broke!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Here, use mine!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Here, use mine!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: But...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: But...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: You young recruits must live to fight another day.{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: You young recruits must live to fight another day.{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: We have to stop that dragon...{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We have to stop that dragon...{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: It must have a weak point! Find it!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: It must have a weak point! Find it!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Graaarrrgh!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Graaarrrgh!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Hey! You okay?{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Hey! You okay?{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Go on. Don't get yourself killed on my account...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Go on. Don't get yourself killed on my account...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: No... Dammit, no!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: No... Dammit, no!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Ugh. She's so strong!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Ugh. She's so strong!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: At this rate, she's gonna reach the Intoners soon!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: At this rate, she's gonna reach the Intoners soon!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Never. We must protect them with our lives!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Never. We must protect them with our lives!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: How can we stand against an Intoner and a dragon?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: How can we stand against an Intoner and a dragon?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: What choice do we have!? All men, take position! Attaaack!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: What choice do we have!? All men, take position! Attaaack!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Your grave beckons, apostate!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Your grave beckons, apostate!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Die, you damned traitorous Intoner!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Die, you damned traitorous Intoner!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: I might take you more seriously if your voice{LF}wasn't quivering...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I might take you more seriously if your voice{LF}wasn't quivering...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Why is an Intoner killing her own?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Why is an Intoner killing her own?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Shall we tell them? They seem genuinely curious.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Shall we tell them? They seem genuinely curious.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Why bother? They're about to die anyway.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Why bother? They're about to die anyway.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The end of the world is nigh...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: The end of the world is nigh...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: They...they told me Intoners were{LF}supposed to be peaceful!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: They...they told me Intoners were{LF}supposed to be peaceful!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: What kind of crap are they teaching{LF}you people these days?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What kind of crap are they teaching{LF}you people these days?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Get a medic! This crazy Intoner's gonna kill us all!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Get a medic! This crazy Intoner's gonna kill us all!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Sure, why not? I haven't killed any medics yet.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Sure, why not? I haven't killed any medics yet.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Get outta my way, dammit!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Get outta my way, dammit!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Be calm, Zero. Anger will only slow your sword.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Be calm, Zero. Anger will only slow your sword.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Look, I know that, it's just... Ah, forget it!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Look, I know that, it's just... Ah, forget it!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Michael! Take 'em out!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Michael! Take 'em out!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: As you wish.{#Name="Michael"}
source: As you wish.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Where the hell are my sisters?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Where the hell are my sisters?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Are you certain about this, Zero?{LF}About slaying all the Intoners?{#Name="Michael"}
source: Are you certain about this, Zero?{LF}About slaying all the Intoners?{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Of course. Why else would I be stabbing everyone?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Of course. Why else would I be stabbing everyone?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Damned...traitorous...Intoner!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Damned...traitorous...Intoner!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Do you hear that? They all name you traitor.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Do you hear that? They all name you traitor.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: I've been called worse.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I've been called worse.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Kill the foul beast! Bring it down!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Kill the foul beast! Bring it down!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: They view me as some kind of monster.{#Name="Michael"}
source: They view me as some kind of monster.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Yeah, I wouldn't worry about it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, I wouldn't worry about it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm doing nothing of the sort.{#Name="Michael"}
source: I'm doing nothing of the sort.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Heh. You always were the sensitive type.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. You always were the sensitive type.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I am nothing of the sort!{#Name="Michael"}
source: I am nothing of the sort!{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Oh, hell. What's this thing?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Oh, hell. What's this thing?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's no human... And yet, not quite a beast.{#Name="Michael"}
source: It's no human... And yet, not quite a beast.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Likely some sort of automaton devised by{LF}the Intoners.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Likely some sort of automaton devised by{LF}the Intoners.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Crafty little bastards...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Crafty little bastards...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Men, take your positions! Stand strong!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Men, take your positions! Stand strong!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Get. Out of. My WAY!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Get. Out of. My WAY!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Don't let her through!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Don't let her through!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Move!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Move!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: She can't be an Intoner... There's no way!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: She can't be an Intoner... There's no way!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: She's a damned demon...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: She's a damned demon...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: There's no way we can win...{LF}We're all gonna die!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: There's no way we can win...{LF}We're all gonna die!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: This is no time for cowardice!{LF}Stand tall and fight!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: This is no time for cowardice!{LF}Stand tall and fight!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Oh, God... No, no, no, no, noooo!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Oh, God... No, no, no, no, noooo!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Damn sniveling civilian recruits...{LF}Charge! Charge now!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Damn sniveling civilian recruits...{LF}Charge! Charge now!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Our messengers are dead! Summon more!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Our messengers are dead! Summon more!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: They'll never arrive in time!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: They'll never arrive in time!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Look at her... Look how fast she is!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Look at her... Look how fast she is!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Shit! She's coming this way! Ruuun!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Shit! She's coming this way! Ruuun!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: This world can't survive without Intoners.{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: This world can't survive without Intoners.{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: If we want the good Intoners to live...{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: If we want the good Intoners to live...{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: then the traitorous one must die!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: then the traitorous one must die!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Shut up with the bullshit already, would you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Shut up with the bullshit already, would you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Fall back! Everyone, fall back!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Fall back! Everyone, fall back!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: What!? If we abandon our posts,{LF}the Intoners will be in danger!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: What!? If we abandon our posts,{LF}the Intoners will be in danger!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: You really think I give a shit right now!?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: You really think I give a shit right now!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Snap out of it, you pathetic craven!{LF}You're a soldier!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Snap out of it, you pathetic craven!{LF}You're a soldier!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Move, move, move, MOVE!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Move, move, move, MOVE!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's Zero! Zero the betrayer!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: It's Zero! Zero the betrayer!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Get the hell outta my way!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Get the hell outta my way!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh crap, she's here! Retreat! Retreeeat!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Oh crap, she's here! Retreat! Retreeeat!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Outta my way!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Outta my way!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: How...how could this happen...?{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: How...how could this happen...?{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Hold on, my beloved sisters.{LF}I'm coming to kill you all.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hold on, my beloved sisters.{LF}I'm coming to kill you all.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Defeat the Titan!{#Name=" "}
source: Defeat the Titan!{#Name=" "}

translation: Find and defeat your sisters at the Cathedral.{#Name=" "}
source: Find and defeat your sisters at the Cathedral.{#Name=" "}
